messages.message:
[Prod, Build] Hey team, I wasn't aware we had the ability to read barcodes within AI Hub? Could someone provide some colour on if this is possible/why it works in this case? In this example, it looks like the OCR text extraction is able to convert the barcode image to the text result successfully

@Lee @Ben Wood
We do run barcode and QR entity model as part of digitization in aihub. CC @Rahul Rawal who had added it
Thanks @Sławek Biel, great that we can do this as part of digitisation. Is there anything we’re doing to the data model to let the LLM know its a barcode / QR?
Reason I ask, is in some docs if you say ‘What is the barcode’ it gives you the right answer, but I can’t tell if its cause it knows its a barcode, or is just by chance it picked the right code

We alter the text sent to the LLM with the decoded barcode, I don’t know the peculiars of how that’s represented.
@Rahul Rawal or @Rakesh would know more.

The barcodes are currently only extracted and inserted into the text as well as ibdoc entities field, so its part of LLM text.  LLM text is not marked with any special identifiers - so as Lee mentioned it might be picking this up by chance. @Sławek Biel are there are special identifiers we can specify for LLM to detect barcodes ?
